translation.en: Don't play with me today, child.
I'm too old, and my backside is too easy a target.
translation.es: Estoy muy viejay mi trasero es un blanco fácil.

translation.en: Your father has been asking for you.
You'll be the death of me.
Put your two feet next to mine, and we'll see.
One day, not so long ago...
translation.es: Un día, no hace mucho tiempo...

translation.en: your mother was sitting in the window,
translation.es: tu madre estaba sentadaen la ventana...

translation.en: looking out on the snow that covered the land.
translation.es: mirando la nieveque lo cubría todo.

translation.en: -She was sewing a cap. -A winter cap.
translation.es: -Estaba cosiendo una gorra.-¿Una gorra de invierno?

translation.en: And wishing for a child to grow inside her belly.
translation.es: Y deseaba que un niñocreciera en su vientre.

translation.en: Suddenly, she pricked her finger with the needle,
translation.es: De pronto, se pinchóel dedo con la aguja...

translation.en: and her blood fell into the snow.
translation.es: y la sangre manchó la nieve.

translation.en: And she looked and thought to herself, "I would like a baby boy."
translation.es: Miró y pensó para sí:"Quisiera tener un niño."

translation.en: [chuckling] Go on with you. You know it better than I do.
translation.es: Sigue. Lo sabes mejor que yo.

translation.en: A little girl with hair as black as the ebony window frame
translation.es: Una niñita conel cabello tan negro comoel ébano de la ventana...

translation.en: and skin as pale as the snow and lips as red as blood.
translation.es: y la piel tan blancacomo la nieve... y los labios tanrojos como la sangre.

translation.en: -[Lilli] Good day. -[woman 3] Always in such a hurry.
What kind of mischief have you been up to today?
I picked roses and irises from the garden with Greta and Ilsa.
translation.es: Junté rosas y lirios del jardíncon Greta e Ilsa.

translation.en: Papa, why does God give us wings when we die?
translation.es: Papá, ¿por qué Dios nos da alascuando morimos?

translation.en: God gives us wings so we can fly out from paradise
translation.es: Dios nos da alaspara que podamos... salir del paraíso ymirar hacia abajo.

translation.en: and look down upon the world.
translation.es: salir del paraíso ymirar hacia abajo.

translation.en: Does Mama look down on me?
and she smiles when she hears your prayers.
What if she doesn't like me?
You are welcome in my house. Thank you, Frederick.
Lilli, I want you to meet Lady Claudia.
translation.es: Lilli, quiero presentartea la Sra. Claudia.

translation.en: Can I put her in a box?
And what will you do with her when she grows wings?
translation.es: ¿Y qué harás con ellacuando le salgan las alas?
Tengo una caja con unasorpresa especial adentro.

translation.en: with a special surprise inside just for you.
translation.es: Tengo una caja con unasorpresa especial adentro. Especialmente para ti.

translation.en: Treat him well, and he will always be faithful.
translation.es: Trátalo bien ysiempre te será leal.

translation.en: Look, Nannau. [Nannau] Come along now, Lilliana.
Now, it is yours as well.
God did not bless him with a graceful tongue,
translation.es: Dios no lo bendijocon la gracia de la lengua...

translation.en: but he more than compensates with the wit of his hands.
translation.es: pero él lo compensa por demáscon la habilidad de sus manos.

translation.en: Well-- [clears throat] I will leave you to unpack.
[Claudia] What a lovely view. [Nannau] Yes, My Lady.

translation.es: Era la preferidade la Sra. Hoffman.

translation.en: Please be careful. It was my mother's.
translation.es: Por favor, con cuidado.Era de mi madre.

translation.en: Tomorrow, I will be a wife.
What would Mother say if she could see me now?
Would she be happy for me?
knowing that the world which so despised her...
translation.es: porque el mundo, quetanto la aborreció...

translation.en: [Frederick] I just wanted to be sure that you have everything you need.
translation.es: Quería asegurarme de quetienes todo lo que necesitas.

translation.en: Thank you, My Lord, but I am not well provided for at all.
translation.es: Gracias, mi señor. Pero nose me ha provisto con todo.

translation.en: I have everything I need but...
I love to hear the sound of my name on your lips.
-Your hands are cold. -Warm them for me.
I saw you come in here, child.
[priest] May she rest in peace forever and ever. Amen.
Do you remember my mother, Ilsa?
I was young, but I remember her.
translation.es: Era muy joven. Pero la recuerdo.

translation.en: My father worshipped her, didn't he?
It's not for me to say, My Lady.
translation.es: No soy quien lo debadecir, mi señora.

translation.en: -[barking] -It's Peter! [Ilsa] What? Back so soon from Paris?
Hold on, now. You can't go running off in your shift. You'll catch your death.
translation.es: Un momento. No puedesalir corriendo encamisón. Se enfermará.

translation.en: Don't you ever wonder what's out there, Ilsa, beyond the fields and walls?
translation.es: ¿Nunca te preguntas cómo esafuera, Ilsa, más allá delos campos y las paredes?

translation.en: The beasts of the forest, I imagine.
translation.es: Imagino que están lasbestias del bosque.

translation.en: There must be more to the world than a forest.
translation.es: Debe haber algomás que el bosque.

translation.en: Why would you want to leave your good home?
Because it's not the same home anymore. It hasn't been for a long time.
translation.es: Porque ya no es el mismo hogar.Hace tiempo que no lo es.

translation.en: [Claudia] Nine years... of casting the runes.
Nine long years of waiting for you to come...
and now you move inside of me.
translation.es: Y ahora te mueves dentro de mí.
Tu sangre se mezcla con la mía.

translation.en: You grow stronger with every beat of my heart.
translation.es: Con cada latido de micorazón, te fortaleces.

translation.en: And I seem to grow more beautiful with each beat of yours.
translation.es: Y yo me pongo más hermosacon cada latido tuyo.
Padre que estás en los cielos...

translation.en: -[Lilli chuckles] -It was round, like a ball,
and on it was a picture of all the lands in the world.
translation.es: Y tenía una pinturade todas las tierras del mundo.

translation.en: Tell me about Paris. Tell me how the ladies spend their days.
translation.es: Háblame de París. Dime cómopasan el día las señoras.

translation.en: -How was your trip? -Much too long, I'm afraid.
translation.es: -Señora Hoffman. -Dr.Gutenberg, ¿cómo fue su viaje? Me temo que demasiado largo.

translation.en: It doesn't show on you at all.
-You're looking radiant, as always. -Oh, thank you.
Lilli, shouldn't you be getting ready for tonight?
I wanted to speak with Peter for a moment.
But your dress is not appropriate for such a conversation.
translation.es: Tu vestido no esapropiado para conversar.

translation.en: Lilli, I have a dress for you to try on... for tonight.
translation.es: Lilli, tengo un vestidopara que te pruebes para hoy.
Me lo probaré más tarde. Creo que si lo usarás estanoche, debes probártelo ahora.

translation.en: Well, I think if you're going to wear it tonight, you should try it on now.
translation.es: Creo que si lo usarás estanoche, debes probártelo ahora.

translation.en: Ilsa, will you help Lilli into it? -And cover your hair-- -I don't know if I'm going to wear it.
translation.es: -Ilsa, ¿podrías ayudara Lilli con él? Y... -Nosé si me lo voy a poner.

translation.en: It's just like all my other dresses.
I want to wear something special for tonight.
But this is special. I wore it myself when I was a girl.
translation.es: Éste es especial.Yo misma me lo puse de niña.

translation.en: Lilli, why must we... struggle so?

translation.es: Frederick, no dijistenada de mi vestido.

translation.en: You have said nothing about my gown tonight.
translation.es: Frederick, no dijistenada de mi vestido. Bendiciones para suhijo, señora Hoffman.

translation.en: [man] A blessing on your child, Lady Hoffman.
[woman] To a healthy son, My Lord. You make "always" sound quite monotonous.
-Where's Lilli? -It's her habit to be late.
translation.es: ¿Dónde está Lilli? -Acostumbra llegar tarde. -¿Cómopuede atrasarse justo hoy?

translation.en: [man 2] Many blessings, My Lady. How could she be late tonight, of all nights?
Must we spend all of our time worrying about Lilli?
translation.es: ¿Debemos pasar todo el tiempopreocupándonos por Lilli?

translation.en: [woman 2] To a healthy child, My Lady.
translation.es: Que tenga un niñosano, mi señora.

translation.en: Lilli, why are you wearing your mother's gown?
translation.es: Lilli, ¿por qué te pusisteel vestido de tu madre?

translation.en: I wanted you to be proud of me.
Your silence is no comfort to me, Peter.
translation.es: Tu silencio no meda calma, Peter.

translation.en: She is in no danger... but she will never bear another child.
translation.es: No está en peligro.Pero no podrá tener otro hijo.

translation.en: Don't let them throw him away.
Why is this happening to me?
Why is this happening to me?
I will always tell you the truth.
Yes. There is so much to envy.
I know we've never gotten along.
translation.es: Sé que nunca nos llevamos bien.

translation.en: I know I pushed you away.
I must have blamed you for so many things...
translation.es: La debo haber culpadode tantas cosas.

translation.en: but I never meant to hurt you.
You're such a lovely girl, Lilli.
I don't think I ever realized...
translation.es: Creo que nunca me di cuenta...

translation.en: [Peter] I have very much enjoyed our time together these past few weeks.
translation.es: Disfruté muchísimo deltiempo que pasamos juntoslas últimas semanas.

translation.en: I must be leaving for Paris in a few days.
translation.es: Debo partir paraParís en unos días.

translation.en: I intend to ask your father for your hand in marriage.
translation.es: quiero pedirle a tu padretu mano en matrimonio.

translation.en: but Lady Hoffman requests your presence at once.
translation.es: pero la Sra. Hoffman solicitasu presencia. Ahora mismo.

translation.en: Will you ride in with me?
I'll meet you at the stables.
What's wrong? Are you all right?
How did she look in that final moment?
Did she beg for her life?
Did she know it was me?
Oh, brother, you mustn't feel remorse.
The blood you spilled was just the venom of a scheming child.
translation.es: La sangre que derramaste fue elveneno de una niña intrigante.

translation.en: Why don't you take what's left to the kitchen...
translation.es: ¿Por qué no llevasel resto a la cocina?

translation.en: put it in the stew by the fire.
translation.es: Ponlo en el estofadojunto al fuego.

translation.en: What the devil is keeping them?
I'm sure she'll be arriving any moment.
translation.es: Estoy segura de que llegaráen cualquier momento.

translation.en: -[Frederick] What is it, Peter? -I've just come from the stables.
Your groomsman found Lilli's horse on the road.
translation.es: Hallaron el caballode Lilli en el camino.

translation.en: If you want to live, don't make a sound.

translation.es: Quietos, abran la puerta.Detrás de las escaleras.

translation.en: Mind the stairs. Lay him on the table.
translation.es: Quietos, abran la puerta.Detrás de las escaleras. Pónganlo sobre la mesa.

translation.en: I've been praying since you left that you would find her.
translation.es: Desde que te fuiste, estuverezando porque la hallaras.

translation.en: We have to keep looking. We have to.
Of course. We will, my beloved.
Why are you here? What's your name, child?
translation.es: -¿Por qué estás aquí?-¿Cómo te llamas, niña?

translation.en: Then she won't make a fuss when the wolves eat her.
translation.es: Entonces, no gritarácuando los lobos se la coman.
Yo digo que la dejemos por ahí.

translation.en: I bet she tastes good too.
translation.es: Apuesto a que también sabe bien.

translation.en: So, we got us a little princess here.
translation.es: Así que tenemos auna princesita aquí.

translation.en: Do you want to see what Lord Hoffman and his judges do to people who steal?
translation.es: ¿Quieres ver lo que elSeñor Hoffman y sus juecesle hacen a los que roban?

translation.en: [woman's voice] Why did you betray me, traitor?
Why are you treating me this way? I've done nothing wrong to any of you.
translation.es: ¿Por qué me tratan así? No les hice nada malo.

translation.en: A kiss. A bow and a kiss.
Here, Princess, kiss this here pair of mugs.
You boys don't see it, do you?
We could get rich off this little morsel.
Your brain's gone soggy with that rotgut you're always swilling.
translation.es: Se te aguó el cerebrocon el matarratas que usas.

translation.en: We scratch around here like rats in the ground,
translation.es: Andamos como ratas por ahí,¿adónde nos lleva eso?

translation.en: and what does it ever get us?
translation.es: Andamos como ratas por ahí,¿adónde nos lleva eso? Nos acerca a la veta.

translation.en: Closer to the mother lode, boy.
No one's asking you to stay, are they?
I bet your daddy wishes his little girl was back home again.
translation.es: Apuesto a que tu papito quiereque su niñita regrese a casa.

translation.en: ...offer just about all his gold to have his little princess back home again...
translation.es: ...ofrecería todo su oro contal de que su princesa regrese.

translation.en: -Get off me! -...safe... -without so much as a scratch on her. -[grunts]
Though I'm sure he wouldn't mind too much if we took just a little something for ourselves...
translation.es: Estoy seguro de queno le importaría sinos llevamos algo...

translation.en: I mean, he's a big man, right?
Maybe you ought to soak yourself in the river.
translation.es: Quizá quieras darteun baño en el río.

translation.en: I'm just trying to keep things lively.
translation.es: Sólo quiero alegrarlas cosas un poco.

translation.en: All of you is gonna die.
The world is a dangerous place, Princess. Keep this close.
translation.es: El mundo es un lugar peligroso,princesa. Guarda esto.

translation.en: What if she flees? Runs away?
She'll never find her way out of here.
[man 1] The little princess is following us.
-[man 1] Hey, Lars. -[caws] Maybe she'll help us find the gold.
translation.es: Oye, Lars, quizá nosayude a hallar el oro.

translation.en: You're not afraid, are you, my child?
My sweetest son, I will keep you safe...
translation.es: Mi querido hijo, temantendré a salvo...

translation.en: And she will never hurt you again.
When she's buried in the ground.
Did you think you could hide from me?
Did you think I wouldn't be able to find you?
What's the matter? Are you frightened?
Is your little heart beginning to pound?
[man 4] Lilli! Get the rope! Grab the rope!
Come on, Gilbert! Take hold of my hand!
Would take some of this lovely soup to my husband?
translation.es: ¿Podrías llevarle esta rica sopaa mi marido?

translation.en: Maybe Rolf was right. Maybe we should have ransomed her.
translation.es: Quizá Rolf teníarazón. Quizá, debimos haberpedido un rescate por ella.

translation.en: She's brought nothing but black luck since she came here.
translation.es: Sólo nos trajo malasuerte desde que vino.

translation.en: It's just the two of us now, Frederick.
Perhaps... the earth has swallowed her up.
translation.es: Quizá se la tragó la tierra.

translation.en: Never look a raven in the eye for too long.
translation.es: Nunca mires a un cuervoa los ojos por largo rato.

translation.en: Might steal your soul and fly away with it.
translation.es: Podría robarte el almae irse volando con ella.

translation.en: Why are you staring at me?
It hadn't occurred to me to look anywhere else.
translation.es: No se me ocurriómirar para otro lado.

translation.en: It's very rude. It's one of my better habits.
translation.es: -Es muy grosero. -Es unade mis mejores costumbres.

translation.en: I take it you have no manners then.
I was just wondering what it would take...
I'm not a princess. What are you then?
translation.es: -No soy una princesa.-¿Y qué eres entonces?

translation.en: I'm the daughter of Frederick Hoffman.
So you're nothing more than a name?
translation.es: Entonces, no eresmás que un nombre.

translation.en: What right do you have to say that? You know nothing about me.
translation.es: ¿Qué derecho tienes dedecir eso? No me conoces.

translation.en: I know enough of your kind.
translation.es: Conozco a los de tu clase.

translation.en: How could you know anything about anyone?
You live like an animal. You hide out like a criminal.
translation.es: Vives como un animal,te escondes como un criminal.

translation.en: And what are you doing, Princess?
translation.es: ¿Y qué haces tú, princesa?¿Estás tomando vacaciones?

translation.en: -Is this some holiday you're taking? -My father will find me.
translation.es: ¿Y qué haces tú, princesa?¿Estás tomando vacaciones? Mi padre me encontrará...

translation.en: Where is this great father of yours? How come he hasn't rescued you?
translation.es: ¿Dónde está tu gran padre?¿Por qué no te rescató?

translation.en: He'll find me, I know it!
-I don't like the way you speak to me. -How would you have me speak?
translation.es: -No me gusta cómo me hablas.-¿Cómo quieres que te hable? Como un caballero civilizado,no como un salvaje.

translation.en: Like a civilized gentleman, not some savage.
translation.es: Como un caballero civilizado,no como un salvaje.

translation.en: That is a word I will not bear from the lips of any man or woman.
translation.es: Eso no lo voy a tolerarde boca de ningún hombreni de ninguna mujer.

translation.en: The last time I heard that word spoken...
translation.es: La última vez que oídecir esa palabra...

translation.en: it was by one of your so-called gentlemen...
translation.es: fue a uno de los quetú llamas caballero.

translation.en: and there was nothing gentle about it...
translation.es: Y no tuvo nada degentil ni de civilizado.

translation.en: Oh, Lady Hoffman. Excuse me, I... I was expecting one of your servants.
translation.es: Sra. Hoffman. Disculpe. Esperabaa uno de sus sirvientes.

translation.en: They became very ill... quite suddenly.

translation.es: -Se enfermaron de pronto.-¿Qué pasó aquí? Fue terrible, hasta mirarlos.Apenas podían caminar.

translation.en: even to look at them. They could barely walk.
translation.es: Fue terrible, hasta mirarlos.Apenas podían caminar.

translation.en: Their hands and their feet were...
translation.es: Tenían las manos y lospies llenos de sangre,y sus rostros...

translation.en: filled with blood, and their faces--
translation.es: Tenían las manos y lospies llenos de sangre,y sus rostros... La Peste Negra.

translation.en: I didn't want to send them away. They were like our family.
translation.es: No quise echarlos, erancomo de la familia.

translation.en: You were compelled to do so.

translation.es: Pasó de todo, Lillisigue sin aparecer y...
Pasó de todo, Lillisigue sin aparecer y... -Sí.-Y con Frederick.
-Sí.-Y con Frederick. Trato de ser fuerte.

translation.en: I'm trying to be strong, but...
I have no one to turn to...
What a fine young man you are.
What a wonderful husband you're going to make Lilli.
-Will you find her for me? -Yes, of course.
translation.es: ¿La encontrarías por mí? Sí, por supuesto.

translation.en: I can rely on you then?
I'll tell Frederick you called. He's much better.
translation.es: -Lo prometo. -Le diré aFrederick que viniste. Está mucho mejor.

translation.en: They tied him to a stake, then burned his family while he watched.
translation.es: Lo ataron a una estacay quemaron a su familiamientras él miraba.

translation.en: Then they placed a red-hot cross of iron on his face...
translation.es: Después le pusieron una cruz dehierro candente en el rostro.

translation.en: because he would not repent. What was his crime?
translation.es: -Porque no se arrepentía.-¿Cuál fue su delito?

translation.en: He would not fight for their cause. Who were they?
-[Will] Lilli, no! -[Lilli] We can't leave him!
-[Will] Let go! There's no time! -[screaming] No!
While your child lies cold and still?
translation.es: Mientras tu hijopermanece frío y quieto.

translation.en: Take back the child, and give him life.
translation.es: Recupera al niño yvuélvelo a la vida.

translation.en: Bathe the child in the father's blood.
translation.es: Baña al niño en lasangre del padre.
La vida de Frederick... por la de él.

translation.en: Hello, Frederick. Did you miss me?
My poor husband. Look at your arm. What happened to you?
translation.es: Mi pobre esposo. Mira tu brazo.¿Qué te pasó?

translation.en: -Where have you been? -Shh. Where are the servants? I looked--
I want to free you of your misery for a little while.
translation.es: Quiero liberarte de tumiseria por un tiempo.

translation.en: I want to give you a moment of peace...
What are you doing to me?
It's what any wife would gladly do for her husband.
translation.es: Es lo que cualquier esposaharía feliz por su esposo.

translation.en: I have seen our child, Frederick.
I want you to give him life.
The life he was meant to have.
translation.es: La vida que se merecía tener.

translation.en: You must become like the serpent.
The serpent's fruit is what you need.
Forgive me for startling you, my dear.
You look troubled. Are you lost?
I was. But now I'm going home.
translation.es: Lo estaba. Peroahora voy a casa.

translation.en: Good. Make sure you're out of the forest by nightfall.
translation.es: Qué bien. Asegúrate de salirdel bosque al anochecer.

translation.en: There are creatures here, men... and beasts.
translation.es: Hay criaturas por aquí.Humanas y bestias.

translation.en: Oh, deary. Do you want an apple? I have another one.
I have no way to pay you for one.
Two ladies on the road together.
Well, don't just look at it, deary. Eat it. [chuckles]
translation.es: Bueno, no la mirestanto, querida. Cómela.

translation.en: I'll share it with a friend.
Life is sweet when you're young, eh?
translation.es: La vida es dulce cuandose es joven, ¿eh?

translation.en: So, tell me, what's he like?
He's strong. Ah, that's good. That's good.
And he's kind and gentle and...
And you love him, don't you?
You can tell me, your old granny. [chuckles]
What's the matter, dear? Cat got your tongue?
translation.es: ¿Qué pasa, querida?¿El ratón te comió la lengua?

translation.en: You can see, and you can hear,
but from inside the tomb of your mind.
translation.es: Pero desde dentro de la tumbade tu mente...

translation.en: No breath will escape your lips, no tears your eyes.
translation.es: no saldrá ningúnaliento de tus labios. Ni lágrimas de tus ojos.

translation.en: To the world, you are dead.
And soon, even your precious father will forget you were ever alive.
translation.es: Y pronto, hastatu precioso padre olvidaráde que alguna vez viviste.

translation.en: You will have all eternity to remember.
translation.es: tendrás toda la eternidad... para recordar.

translation.en: [man] What are you doing? [Peter] I'm a doctor.
-We're going to be married. -Can you help her?

translation.es: -Aún no lo sé.-¿La puede ayudar, por favor?

translation.en: -Can you help her, please? -I said, I don't know yet!
translation.es: -Aún no lo sé.-¿La puede ayudar, por favor? Dije que aún no lo sé.

translation.en: I said her limbs are stiffening. There's nothing more I can do.
translation.es: Dije que sus miembrosse endurecen. Nopuedo hacer nada más.

translation.en: I'm going home. I'm going to take her back to her family for a proper burial.
translation.es: Voy a casa. La llevaréde vuelta para que tengaun entierro apropiado.

translation.en: I demand you stop this at once.
[panting] I brought someone... to keep you company.
translation.es: Traje a alguien paraque te haga compañía.

translation.en: She knew I would come back.
I'm going to go find her.
I'm going to find my father.
translation.es: Voy a buscar a mi padre.

translation.en: Father, it's me. Go away. My daughter is dead.
translation.es: -Padre, soy yo.-Vete. Mi hija está muerta.

translation.en: Take my father out of here.
translation.es: Saca a mi padre de aquí.

translation.en: for a little wench who's been rotting in the ground.
translation.es: para una mocita que se estuvopudriendo en la tierra.

translation.en: the moment you took your first breath.
It was like a knife in my heart. You have no heart.
translation.es: -Fue como una puñalada alcorazón. -Tú no tienes corazón.

translation.en: I've seen what you've done to my father.
translation.es: Vi lo que le hiciste a mi padre.

translation.en: He is alive in this room.
Oh, dear, don't point that thing at me.
translation.es: Querida, no meapuntes con esa cosa.

translation.en: What have you done to me?
What have you done to me?
